Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level Upper Elementary. Limit the output to 150 words. Human aging is a natural process that happens over time. Text: Generate a short paragraph about 'human aging' targeting readability level Upper Elementary. Limit the output to 150 words. Human aging is the process by which our bodies change over time. As we grow older, our cells divide less often, making it harder for our bodies to repair themselves. This can lead to wrinkles, gray hair, and weaker bones. Our brains also change, which can make it harder to remember things. We might need glasses to see better, and our hearing may not be as sharp. These changes are a normal part of life, but scientists are always learning more about how to help us live healthier, happier lives as we age.
